description: AWS::RoboMaker::SimulationApplicationVersion resource creates an AWS RoboMaker SimulationApplicationVersion. This helps you control which code your simulation uses.

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:[\w+=/,.@-]+:[\w+=/,.@-]+:[\w+=/,.@-]*:[0-9]*:[\w+=,.@-]+(/[\w+=,.@-]+)*  
Update requires: No interruption

CurrentRevisionId.description: The revision ID of robot application.
CurrentRevisionId.markdownDescription:
The revision ID of robot application.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 40  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.\-]*  
Update requires: Replacement

ApplicationVersion.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
